org.sd.cluster.io
Class NodeClient

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.sd.cluster.io.NodeClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class NodeClient
extends java.lang.Thread

Node client.

Multithreaded management of client messages sent to a NodeServer.

Author:
Spence Koehler

SHUTDOWN_LATENCY

public static final int SHUTDOWN_LATENCY
Maximum shutdown latency, or time between shutting down the server and its thread dying. In millis.

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

NodeClient

public NodeClient(java.lang.String name,
                  java.net.InetAddress inetAddress,
                  int numSocketThreads)
Construct a node client.

Parameters:
name - A string to distinguish one client in the same jvm from another. ok if null.
inetAddress - The inet address of the client for identification.
numSocketThreads - Number of threads to pool for managing sockets.

sendMessage

public Message[] sendMessage(java.net.InetSocketAddress[] serverAddresses,
                             Message message,
                             int checkInterval,
                             int timeout,
                             int timeLimit)
Multicast the message to the servers.

NOTE: it is up to the consumer of this method to do handle the responses, which are not guaranteed to be in any particular order. That is, response[i] does not necessarily correspond to serverAddresses[i].

sendMessages

public Message[] sendMessages(java.net.InetSocketAddress[] serverAddresses,
                              Message[] messages,
                              int checkInterval,
                              int timeout,
                              int timeLimit)
Multicast the messages to the servers, sending message[i] to server[i].

NOTE: it is up to the consumer of this method to do handle the responses, which are not guaranteed to be in any particular order. That is, response[i] does not necessarily correspond to serverAddresses[i].

void sendMessagesAsync(java.net.InetSocketAddress[] serverAddresses,
                       Message message,
                       int checkInterval)

                            int timeLimit)
